mapper.select: select FDUMEASUREID, FDCMEASURENAME, FDULINKID, FDURELATIONID, FDCMEASURETYPE, FDCSUMSTYLE, FDCFACTTABLENAME, FDCFACTTABLECAPTION, FDCFIELDNAME, FDIVIRTUALFACT, FDCCOMPOSESTYLE, FDCRULETYPE, FDCDATEFORMAT, FDCDESC from TBMEASURE where FDUMEASUREID = #{measureID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select FDUMEASUREID, FDCMEASURENAME, FDULINKID, FDURELATIONID, FDCMEASURETYPE, FDCSUMSTYLE, FDCFACTTABLENAME, FDCFACTTABLECAPTION, FDCFIELDNAME, FDIVIRTUALFACT, FDCCOMPOSESTYLE, FDCRULETYPE, FDCDATEFORMAT, FDCDESC from TBMEASURE where FDCFACTTABLECAPTION = #{factTableCaption,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select FDUMEASUREID, FDCMEASURENAME, FDULINKID, FDURELATIONID, FDCMEASURETYPE, FDCSUMSTYLE, FDCFACTTABLENAME, FDCFACTTABLECAPTION, FDCFIELDNAME, FDIVIRTUALFACT, FDCCOMPOSESTYLE, FDCRULETYPE, FDCDATEFORMAT, FDCDESC from TBMEASURE where FDCFACTTABLENAME = #{factTableName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and FDULINKID = #{linkID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select FDUMEASUREID, FDCMEASURENAME, FDULINKID, FDURELATIONID, FDCMEASURETYPE, FDCSUMSTYLE, FDCFACTTABLENAME, FDCFACTTABLECAPTION, FDCFIELDNAME, FDIVIRTUALFACT, FDCCOMPOSESTYLE, FDCRULETYPE, FDCDATEFORMAT, FDCDESC from TBMEASURE where FDCFACTTABLENAME = #{factTableName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select FDCFACTTABLENAME from TBMEASURE t left join TBCUBEDEFINE m on t.FDUMEASUREID = m.FDUOBJECTID where m.FDCCUBEID = #{fduCubeID,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and m.FDCOBJECTTYPE = 'M' group by FDCFACTTABLENAME
mapper.insert: insert into TBMEASURE (FDUMEASUREID, FDCMEASURENAME, FDULINKID, FDURELATIONID, FDCMEASURETYPE, FDCSUMSTYLE, FDCFACTTABLENAME, FDCFACTTABLECAPTION, FDCFIELDNAME, FDIVIRTUALFACT, FDCCOMPOSESTYLE, FDCRULETYPE, FDCDATEFORMAT, FDCDESC ) values (#{measureID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{measureName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{linkID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{relationID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{measureType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{sumStyle,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{factTableName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{factTableCaption,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fieldName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{virtualFact,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{composeStyle,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{ruleType,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{dateFormat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update TBMEASURE set FDCMEASURENAME = #{measureName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FDULINKID = #{linkID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FDURELATIONID = #{relationID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FDCMEASURETYPE = #{measureType,jdbcType=CHAR}, FDCSUMSTYLE = #{sumStyle,jdbcType=CHAR}, FDCFACTTABLENAME = #{factTableName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FDCFACTTABLECAPTION = #{factTableCaption,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FDCFIELDNAME = #{fieldName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FDIVIRTUALFACT = #{virtualFact,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FDCCOMPOSESTYLE = #{composeStyle,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FDCRULETYPE = #{ruleType,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FDCDATEFORMAT = #{dateFormat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FDCDESC = #{desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where FDUMEASUREID = #{measureID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
